title: Buffalo shooting: Ten dead in attack at supermarket in New York state
description: A suspect is arrested over the attack, which is being investigated as a racially-motivated hate crime.

title: Eurovision 2022: Ukraine wins, while the UK's Sam Ryder comes second
description: Ukraine's Kalush Orchestra triumphs, while Sam Ryder gives the UK its best result since 1998.

title: Ukraine war: Putin warns Finland joining Nato would be 'mistake'
description: Finland and Sweden have indicated they want to become Nato members following Russia's war in Ukraine.

title: North Korea: Covid outbreak a great disaster, says Kim Jong-un
description: North Korea's leader blames the outbreak on bureaucratic and medical incompetence.

title: Shireen Abu Aqla: UN condemns killing of Al Jazeera reporter
description: Shireen Abu Aqla was shot dead in disputed circumstances in the occupied West Bank.

title: Delhi office fire: Dozens killed as fire sweeps through building
description: Most of those inside were women, leaving families frantically searching for news of their fate.

title: Nigeria student killing: Round-the-clock curfew in Sokoto after protests
description: Demonstrators have been demanding the release of two suspects held over the murder of a Christian student.

title: Rome Open: Iga Swiatek beats Aryna Sabalenka to reach Rome Open final
description: Iga Swiatek extends her winning run to 27 matches and moves within one victory of a fifth consecutive title by reaching the Italian Open final.

title: Kenyan fighting FGM crowned world's best nurse
description: Anna Qabale Duba says the $250,000 prize money will help expand her school for children and adults.

title: Mao Zedong scroll thieves jailed in Hong Kong
description: The thieves were unaware of its value and sold it to an amateur collector for less than $25 (Â£20).

title: Brittney Griner: US basketball star has Russian detention extended
description: Russian media says Moscow wishes to "swap" Griner for the arms trafficker Viktor Bout.

title: Elon Musk puts Twitter deal on hold over fake account details
description: The billionaire wants more data on fake accounts, prompting speculation over the deal's future.

title: Covid: What will the pandemic look like in North Korea?
description: North Korea is uniquely vulnerable to the virus, and the options to control its spread are limited.

title: East Africa drought: 'The suffering here has no equal'
description: Some 20 million people face severe hunger but aid agencies say the world's attention is on Ukraine.

title: Ukraine conflict: Russian soldiers seen killing unarmed civilians
description: The incident, captured on video seen by the BBC, is being investigated as a suspected war crime.

title: Sri Lanka crisis: How war heroes became villains
description: The Rajapaksa brothers, hailed by many as heroes for winning the civil war, are now reviled as leaders.

title: Afghanistan pupils in fear after spate of Islamic State attacks
description: A spate of Islamic State attacks have left Afghan students in fear and test Taliban security claims.

title: Eurovision 2022: Highlights of Ukraine's winning night
description: Ukraine won the Eurovision song contest 2022, with the UK coming second, its best result since 1998.

title: Fleeing Syria 10 years on: 'We cried all the way to Jordan'
description: A family looks back after a decade living in the world's largest Syrian refugee camp.

title: Roe v Wade: Thousands attend rallies in US cities to support abortion rights
description: Pro-choice supporters are concerned that the Supreme Court could overturn the legal right to abortion.

title: Violence at Al Jazeera journalist's funeral procession
description: Police with riot gear hit mourners, saying they were pelted with stones, as crowds carry her coffin.

title: Custom-made brace helps heal baby giraffe
description: Vets in San Diego, California, came up with a creative solution to treat a young calf's limb disorder.
